meanings.definition: Those who are not part of a family.
meanings.sent1: In the park, there were many nonfamilies enjoying a picnic.
meanings.sent2: The community center organized a special event for nonfamilies in the area.
meanings.sent3: The nonfamilies at the zoo were amazed by the playful monkeys.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were bustling with nonfamilies, each with their own stories to tell.
meanings.sent5: The nonfamilies gathered around the bonfire, sharing laughter and stories.

meanings.definition: Not related to or characteristic of a family.
meanings.sent1: The apartment complex was designed with nonfamilies in mind, offering smaller units.
meanings.sent2: The hotel catered to nonfamilies by providing separate rooms for each guest.
meanings.sent3: The nonfamilies at the party were impressed by the variety of snacks available.
meanings.sent4: Her nonfamilies-like approach to problem-solving made her stand out in the team.
meanings.sent5: The nonfamilies atmosphere of the office made it a comfortable place to work.
